name: Revealed (Aramsantze)
description:
The sequel's for Simple Escape

Reveal what's happened before, 

-----

Pillar 1: you can use ASWD or click to where you want the square to go, tips (use ASWD only on the straight path)

Pillar 2: hover every side of the room to see if there was a door or not.

RYB cube puzzle: hold then drag, doing it slowly.

Disclaimer!

please before playing any pillar checks if there was a bug,

if yes, restart the game or refresh the page
